spine_hook: Success = incremental early-window visits per $1 that lift early-window buyer share to 20%+ while holding event CPA ≤0.8× baseline and QR redemptions ≥5% of footfall.

anchors.headline: Current early-window buyer share
anchors.expression: Share of total holiday-period buyers who transacted in Nov 18–Dec 02 window

anchors.headline: Loyalty programs with emotional connection multiply visits
anchors.expression: Multiplier on visits and sales when loyalty programs drive emotional connection

anchors.headline: Target early-window foot-traffic uplift (base)
anchors.expression: Incremental store visits in Nov 18–Dec 02 vs prior comparable period

anchors.headline: Event CPA ceiling
anchors.expression: Event CPA expressed as multiple of baseline CPA for comparable holiday events

measurement_plan.metric: Incremental early-window visits per $1 by channel
measurement_plan.expression: (Visits_treatment − Visits_control) / Spend_treatment; run per-dollar test for: 1) $1 loyalty credit, 2) $1 retail media CPM-equivalent, 3) $1 collab reach spend
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Directly answers which $1 buys more early-window visits while limiting blanket discounts.

measurement_plan.expression: Spend_on_treatment / Incremental_buyers_at_event_window; compare to baseline CPA and target ≤0.8×
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Ensures the chosen dollar does not raise acquisition cost above target ceiling.

measurement_plan.expression: QR_scans_at_store / Total_store_visits; aim ≥5% of footfall from QR redemptions in pilot stores
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Tracks conversion lift from collab in-store activation without blanket discounts.

measurement_plan.metric: Buyer activity share vs promo intensity (paired metric)
measurement_plan.expression: Weekly buyer share by cohort / Promo intensity index (headline discount depth × reach); report side-by-side to detect dilution or dependence
measurement_plan.timeframe: Baseline 2 weeks prior and Nov 18 – Dec 02 window
measurement_plan.why_it_matters: Shows whether share gains come from marginal buyers or from deeper discounting; guides whether to scale channel.
